    1. ReferenceWindow()

类 ReferenceWindow

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.constants.ReferenceWindow
public class ReferenceWindow extends Object
The ReferenceWindow class defines constants for the reference window dimensions and positioning in the game. These constants are used to standardize UI element placement and scaling relative to the reference window.

The class also includes constants for judgment line positioning and unit measurements for consistent layout design.

    修饰符和类型

    The reference window height in pixels.
    static final double
    REF_WIN_W
    The reference window width in pixels.
    static final double
    UNIT
    A base unit used for scaling and positioning calculations, typically equal to a single "unit" of the UI grid.
    static final double[]
    VERTICAL_JUDGEMENT_LINE_POS
    The positions of vertical judgment lines in the reference window.
    static final double
    VERTICAL_JUDGEMENT_SPACING
    The vertical spacing between judgment lines in pixels.

    • HORIZONTAL_JUDGEMENT_LINE_POS

      public static final double[] HORIZONTAL_JUDGEMENT_LINE_POS
      The positions of horizontal judgment lines in the reference window.
      • Index 0: The primary horizontal line position.
      • Index 1: The secondary horizontal line position.

    • VERTICAL_JUDGEMENT_LINE_POS

      public static final double[] VERTICAL_JUDGEMENT_LINE_POS
      The positions of vertical judgment lines in the reference window. These are evenly spaced along the height of the window.
